00040    /* 
00041    * Read parameter and configuration files, initialize system.
00042    */
00043    void NveVvIntegrator::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00044    {
00045       read<double>(in, "dt", dt_);
00046 
00047       int nAtomType = simulation().nAtomType();
00048       prefactors_.allocate(nAtomType);
00049 
00050    }
00051 
00052    /* 
00053    * Initialize constants.
00054    */
00055    void NveVvIntegrator::setup() 
00056    {
00057       double mass;
00058       int nAtomType = prefactors_.capacity();
00059       for (int i = 0; i < nAtomType; ++i) {
00060          mass = simulation().atomType(i).mass();
00061          prefactors_[i] = 0.5*dt_/mass;
00062       }
00063    }
00064 
00065    /*
00066    * Verlet MD NVE integrator step
00067    *
00068    * This method implements the algorithm:
00069    *
00070    *        vm(n)  = v(n) + 0.5*a(n)*dt
00071    *        x(n+1) = x(n) + vm(n)*dt
00072    *
00073    *        calculate acceleration a(n+1)
00074    *
00075    *        v(n+1) = vm(n) + 0.5*a(n+1)*dt
00076    *
00077    * where x is position, v is velocity, and a is acceleration.
00078    */
00079    void NveVvIntegrator::step() 
00080    {
00081       Vector dv;
00082       Vector dr;
00083       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00084       double prefactor;
00085       //double dtHalf = 0.5*dt_;
00086       int    iSpecies, nSpecies;
00087 
00088       nSpecies = simulation().nSpecies();
00089 
00090       // 1st half velocity Verlet, loop over atoms 
00091       #if USE_ITERATOR
00092       Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00093       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00094          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00095          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00096             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00097 
00098                prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00099 
00100                dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00101                atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00102 
00103                dr.multiply(atomIter->velocity(), dt_);
00104                atomIter->position() += dr;
00105 
00106             }
00107          }
00108       }
00109       #else 
00110       Atom* atomPtr;
00111       int   ia;
00112       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00113          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00114          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00115             for (ia=0; ia < molIter->nAtom(); ++ia) {
00116                atomPtr = &molIter->atom(ia);
00117                prefactor = prefactors_[atomPtr->typeId()];
00118 
00119                dv.multiply(atomPtr->force(), prefactor);
00120                atomPtr->velocity() += dv;
00121                dr.multiply(atomPtr->velocity(), dt_);
00122                
00123                atomPtr->position() += dr;
00124 
00125             }
00126          }
00127       }
00128       #endif
00129 
00130       system().calculateForces();
00131 
00132       // 2nd half velocity Verlet, loop over atoms
00133       #if USE_ITERATOR
00134       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00135          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00136          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00137             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00138                prefactor = prefactors_[atomIter->typeId()];
00139                dv.multiply(atomIter->force(), prefactor);
00140                atomIter->velocity() += dv;
00141             }
00142          }
00143       }
00144       #else
00145       for (iSpecies=0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00146          system().begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00147          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter)
00148          {
00149             for (ia=0; ia < molIter->nAtom(); ++ia) {
00150                atomPtr = &molIter->atom(ia);
00151                prefactor = prefactors_[atomPtr->typeId()];
00152                dv.multiply(atomPtr->force(), prefactor);
00153                atomPtr->velocity() += dv;
00154             }
00155          }
00156       }
00157       #endif
00158 
00159       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00160       if (!system().pairPotential().isPairListCurrent()) {
00161          system().pairPotential().buildPairList();
00162       }
00163       #endif
00164 
00165    }
00166

00170    void NveVvIntegrator::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00171    {  
00172       ar & dt_;
00173       ar & prefactors_;
00174    }
00175

00181       ar & dt_;
00182       ar & prefactors_;
00183    }
